summary: Sid is an IT security academic with nearly two decades of experience serving a wide range of international organizations such ISACA, IEEE and the BCS.Technical SecurityInformation Security ProfessionalInformation Security RiskSecurity Team LeaderEnforce information Security Policies Provide Security advice on Security IncidentsProvide Security reviewsCyber Threats AnalysisThreat and Vulnerability Scanning ManagementSid started his career as a Unix security technician at the Post Office communications headquarters, promptly advancing as a senior firewall and Network engineer. At Ericsson pursued the role of hands-on Firewall Analyst, designer, and developer in addition to that role served as an IT security asset for Ericsson communications. Providing a broad range of expertise to major projects such as BCP planning, global security risk analysis as well as security architecture.He is trained to work with such organizations as the US DoD as a contractor for RSS, approved as an information security analyst, Information security classifier and risk assessor as well as certified by the DoD as an external contractor. Hands-on training in providing secure satellite communication in civil and harsh terrain. Sid has led an extensive successful consultancy career in Cyber Security for several  organizations working for RSS consultancy practice catering a broad range of sectors including:•	Government – Public Sector & Private Sector •	Telecommunications•	Information technology•	Banking•	Financial•	Defense  Sid’s ambition is to author many publications on cybersecurity as well as cyber war defense strategies to benefit the community. As well as introduce many aspects of industry to academia while studying for his Ph.D.
